Title: Lost and Delirious
Actors: Piper Perabo, Jessica Paré, Mischa Barton, Jackie Burroughs
Plot: Lost and Delirious is the story of three adolescent girls' first love, their discovery of sexual passion, and their search for identities. Set in a posh, private boarding school surrounded by luxuriant, green forest, Lost and Delirious moves swiftly from academic routine, homesickness, and girlish silliness to the darker region of lover's intrigue.
